016package de.cuioss.test.jsf.util;
017
018import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.JsfTestContextConfigurator;
019import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.ApplicationConfigDecorator;
020import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.ComponentConfigDecorator;
021import de.cuioss.test.jsf.config.decorator.RequestConfigDecorator;
022import de.cuioss.test.jsf.junit5.JsfSetupExtension;
023import jakarta.faces.application.Application;
024import jakarta.faces.application.NavigationHandler;
025import jakarta.faces.context.ExternalContext;
026import jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext;
027import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
028import org.apache.myfaces.test.mock.MockHttpServletResponse;
029import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.TestInstancePostProcessor;
030
031import static de.cuioss.tools.string.MoreStrings.emptyToNull;
032import static org.junit.jupiter.api.Assertions.*;
033
034/**
035 * Simple interface to be used in context of {@link JsfSetupExtension}. It
036 * provides an interface for injecting the configured
037 * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}. It is needed, when the test needs to access
038 * either an {@link JsfTestContextConfigurator} like
039 * {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} or {@link RequestConfigDecorator} or a
040 * JSF-Object like {@link FacesContext} or {@link Application} programmatically.
041 * The typical usage:
042 *
043 * <pre>
044 * <code>
045 * &#64;Setter
046 * &#64;Getter
047 * private JsfEnvironmentHolder environmentHolder;
048 * </code>
049 *
050 * </pre>
051 * <p>
052 * The actual delegation is implemented using default implementations within
053 * this interface, see the unit-test:
054 *
055 * <pre>
056 * <code>
057 * &#64;EnableJsfEnvironment
058 * &#64;JsfTestConfiguration(BasicApplicationConfiguration.class)
059 * class JsfSetupExtensionTest implements JsfEnvironmentConsumer {
060 *
061 * &#64;Setter
062 * &#64;Getter
063 * private JsfEnvironmentHolder environmentHolder;
064 *
065 * &#64;Test
066 * void shouldBootstrapJsf() {
067 * assertNotNull(environmentHolder);
068 * assertNotNull(getApplication());
069 * assertNotNull(getApplicationConfigDecorator());
070 * assertNotNull(getBeanConfigDecorator());
071 * assertNotNull(getComponentConfigDecorator());
072 * assertNotNull(getExternalContext());
073 * assertNotNull(getFacesContext());
074 * assertNotNull(getRequestConfigDecorator());
075 * assertNotNull(getResponse());
076 * }
077 *
078 * &#64;Test
079 * void shouldApplyBasicConfiguration() {
080 * assertEquals(BasicApplicationConfiguration.FIREFOX,
081 * getExternalContext().getRequestHeaderMap().get(BasicApplicationConfiguration.USER_AGENT));
082 * }
083 * </code>
084 * </pre>
085 *
086 * @author Oliver Wolff
087 */
088public interface JsfEnvironmentConsumer {
089
090    /**
091     * @return holder set by {@link #setEnvironmentHolder(JsfEnvironmentHolder)}
092     */
093    JsfEnvironmentHolder getEnvironmentHolder();
094
095    /**
096     * @param holder to be set, is never null. Will be called from
097     *               {@link TestInstancePostProcessor#postProcessTestInstance(Object, org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.ExtensionContext)}
098     */
099    void setEnvironmentHolder(JsfEnvironmentHolder holder);
100
101    /**
102     * @return an {@link ComponentConfigDecorator} for the contained
103     * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}
104     */
105    default ComponentConfigDecorator getComponentConfigDecorator() {
106        return getEnvironmentHolder().getComponentConfigDecorator();
107    }
108
109    /**
110     * @return an {@link ApplicationConfigDecorator} for the contained
111     * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}
112     */
113    default ApplicationConfigDecorator getApplicationConfigDecorator() {
114        return getEnvironmentHolder().getApplicationConfigDecorator();
115    }
116
117    /**
118     * @return an {@link RequestConfigDecorator} for the contained
119     * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}
120     */
121    default RequestConfigDecorator getRequestConfigDecorator() {
122        return getEnvironmentHolder().getRequestConfigDecorator();
123    }
124
125    /**
126     * @return an {@link FacesContext} for the contained
127     * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}
128     */
129    default FacesContext getFacesContext() {
130        return getEnvironmentHolder().getFacesContext();
131    }
132
133    /**
134     * @return an {@link Application} for the contained {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}
135     */
136    default Application getApplication() {
137        return getEnvironmentHolder().getApplication();
138    }
139
140    /**
141     * @return an {@link ExternalContext} for the contained
142     * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}
143     */
144    default ExternalContext getExternalContext() {
145        return getEnvironmentHolder().getExternalContext();
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * @return an {@link MockHttpServletResponse} for the contained
150     * {@link JsfEnvironmentHolder}
151     */
152    default MockHttpServletResponse getResponse() {
153        return getEnvironmentHolder().getResponse();
154    }
155
156    /**
157     * Asserts whether a navigation was handled by calling
158     * {@link NavigationHandler#handleNavigation(jakarta.faces.context.FacesContext, String, String)}
159     *
160     * @param outcome must not be null
161     */
162    default void assertNavigatedWithOutcome(final String outcome) {
163        assertNotNull(emptyToNull(outcome), "Outcome must not be null");
164        assertTrue(getFacesContext().getExternalContext().isResponseCommitted(), "Response is not committed");
165        var handler = getApplicationConfigDecorator().getMockNavigationHandler();
166        assertTrue(handler.isHandleNavigationCalled(), "handleNavigation is not called");
167        assertEquals(outcome, handler.getCalledOutcome());
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Asserts whether a navigation was initialized by calling
172     * {@link ExternalContext#redirect(String)}
173     *
174     * @param redirectUrl must not be null
175     */
176    default void assertRedirect(final String redirectUrl) {
177        assertNotNull(emptyToNull(redirectUrl), "redirectUrl must not be null");
178        assertTrue(getFacesContext().getExternalContext().isResponseCommitted(), "Response is not committed");
179        var tempResponse = (HttpServletResponse) getExternalContext().getResponse();
180        assertTrue(tempResponse.containsHeader("Location"), "Response must provide a header with the name 'Location'");
181        assertEquals(redirectUrl, tempResponse.getHeader("Location"));
182    }
183}
